tool.name: Split pathset
tool.description: Split a pathset according to a regular expression criteria

param.name: anchor_end
param.label: Anchor expression and the end of the string (like $)

param.name: expand_levels
param.label: Expand paths by at least this many levels before applying criteria

param.name: no_match_name
param.label: Name of dataset not matching criteria

tool.help:
Splits a pathset according to a regular expression.
You can have the tool expand the paths in the pathset by a certain number of levels prior to testing whether it matches the regular expression.
**Note**: you can't use '$' in your regular expression. To anchor the expression to the end of the path use the checkbox.
*Note*: the regular expression must match the path from its beginning.
